participant_1.background:
I played fetch with my black lab in the park today.
I do laundry every other week, but I wish I could do it more often.
I took some time off to travel and explore my interests.
i like to race go carts.
my hobbies include photography and hiking.

participant_2.background:
I am not rich, but I am happy with my life.
i spend my free time volunteering at nursing homes.
My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him.
I'll probably spend too much time watching YouTube videos of my favorite bands when I'm home.
I am too strict with my soldiers, sometimes I make them do things that are too dangerous.

content.text: Hi there! I love volunteering at nursing homes, and I spend a lot of time with my dog.
That's great! I love dogs too. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a black lab. He's my best friend.
That's awesome. I have a black lab too! I love him to death.
They're the best dogs! I love how they're always happy to see you.
Me too! I wish I could spend more time with him.
I know what you mean. I wish I could take him everywhere with me.
He's my best friend. I'd be lost without him.
I feel the same way about my dog.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to watch YouTube videos of my favorite bands.
That's cool. I like to watch YouTube videos too.
What kind of videos do you like to watch?
I like to watch videos about music, history, and science.
That's cool. I like to watch videos about music, animals, and history.
We have a lot in common!
